update hklk_school_curriculum_apply
curriculum_id = #{curriculumId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
apply_remark = #{applyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
begin_of_select_time = #{beginOfSelectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_of_select_time = #{endOfSelectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
curr_start_time = #{currStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
class_place = #{classPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_num = #{maxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_op_user_id = #{orderOpUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_remark = #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_fine_quality = #{isFineQuality,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applicable_grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select apply.*,COUNT(id) as num ,GROUP_CONCAT(id) ids from ( select sca.id,CONCAT(st.nickname,'/',st.phone) as applyPerson, c.`name` as applyCurriculum,c.id as applyCurriculumId, IFNULL(SUM(cs.num*cs.unit_price),0) as totalPrice, sca.applicable_grade as grade,c.class_hours as classHours ,sca.apply_remark as applyRemark,sca.apply_time as applyTime,sca.max_num maxNum,sca.class_place classPlace,sca.teacher_id teacherId,sca.begin_of_select_time beginOfSelectTime, sca.end_of_select_time endOfSelectTime,sca.curr_start_time currStartTime,sca.is_fine_quality isFineQuality from hklk_school_curriculum_apply sca LEFT JOIN hklk_curriculum c on sca.curriculum_id = c.id LEFT JOIN hklk_school_teacher st on sca.teacher_id = st.id LEFT JOIN hklk_consumables cs on sca.curriculum_id = cs.curriculum_id where sca.school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and sca.status = 0 group by sca.id) apply GROUP BY apply.applyPerson,apply.applyCurriculumId,apply.beginOfSelectTime,apply.endOfSelectTime,apply.currStartTime order by apply.applyTime desc

SELECT sca.id, c.`name` AS curriculum_name, sca.applicable_grade as grade, sca.curriculum_id, CONCAT(st.nickname,'/',st.phone) AS teacher_name, sca.curr_start_time, sca.max_num, sca.class_place, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(sca.begin_of_select_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),' 至 ',DATE_FORMAT(sca.end_of_select_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) as choose_time,sca.is_fine_quality, (select count(1) from hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc where scc.sca_id = sca.id and scc.pay_state !=-1) as student_num,
CASE WHEN sca.begin_of_select_time > SYSDATE() THEN 0/*未开课*/ WHEN sca.begin_of_select_time < SYSDATE() and SYSDATE() < sca.end_of_select_time THEN 1/*开始选课*/ WHEN sca.end_of_select_time < SYSDATE() and SYSDATE() < sca.curr_start_time THEN 2/*备课中*/ WHEN SYSDATE() > sca.curr_start_time and SYSDATE() < date_add( sca.curr_start_time, INTERVAL (SELECT CEILING(tc.class_hours/count(ts.id))*7 from hklk_curriculum tc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_curriculum_apply tsca on tc.id = tsca.curriculum_id left join hklk_school_syllabus ts on tsca.id = ts.sca_id where tsca.id = sca.id GROUP BY tsca.id) DAY ) THEN 3/*开始上课*/ WHEN SYSDATE() > date_add( sca.curr_start_time, INTERVAL (SELECT CEILING(tc.class_hours/count(ts.id))*7 from hklk_curriculum tc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_curriculum_apply tsca on tc.id = tsca.curriculum_id left join hklk_school_syllabus ts on tsca.id = ts.sca_id where tsca.id = sca.id GROUP BY tsca.id) DAY ) THEN 4/*已结束*/ END as apply_status
, concat(group_concat(h.week_type),'|',max(h.class_time)) class_time FROM hklk_school_curriculum_apply sca LEFT JOIN hklk_school_teacher st ON sca.teacher_id = st.id LEFT JOIN hklk_curriculum c ON sca.curriculum_id = c.id RIGHT JOIN hklk_school_syllabus h on sca.id = h.sca_id WHERE sca.STATUS = 3 and sca.school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and c.name like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%')
GROUP BY sca.id

SELECT sca.id,c.`name` as curriculum_name,sca.curriculum_id,hs.name as school_name,sca.applicable_grade as grade,st.nickname as teacher_name,sca.begin_of_select_time,sca.end_of_select_time,sca.max_num, (select count(1) from hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc where scc.sca_id = sca.id and scc.pay_state !=-1) as student_num, CASE WHEN sca.end_of_select_time< now() or sca.max_num = (select count(1) from hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc where scc.sca_id = sca.id) THEN 1 else 0 end is_sign,sca.order_remark,h.nickname as op_person,sca.is_fine_quality,count(h2.id) as ishc FROM hklk_school_curriculum_apply sca LEFT JOIN hklk_school_teacher st ON sca.teacher_id = st.id left join hklk_school hs on hs.id = sca.school_id LEFT JOIN hklk_curriculum c ON sca.curriculum_id = c.id left join hklk_user h on sca.order_op_user_id = h.id left join hklk_consumables h2 on c.id = h2.curriculum_id where sca.status in (2,3)
and c.name like CONCAT('%',#{queryParam}, '%')
and sca.order_op_user_id is null
and sca.order_op_user_id is not null
GROUP BY sca.id

SELECT ss.*,scc.pay_state,h.name as class_name FROM hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_student ss ON scc.student_id = ss.id left join hklk_school_class h on ss.class_id = h.id where scc.sca_id = #{scaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT *, group_concat( case when ss.week_type =1 then '周一' when ss.week_type =2 then '周二' when ss.week_type =3 then '周三' when ss.week_type =4 then '周四' when ss.week_type =5 then '周五' end SEPARATOR '、') classTime FROM ( SELECT sca.id, sca.is_fine_quality as isFineQuality, c.`name` AS curriculumName, c.cover, sca.applicable_grade AS grade, sca.curriculum_id as curriculumId, st.nickname AS teacherName, sca.curr_start_time as currStartTime, sca.max_num maxNum, sca.class_place classPlace, c.class_hours classHours, (select GROUP_CONCAT(d.name) from hklk_dic d where FIND_IN_SET(d.id, c.learning_style)>0 GROUP BY d.typecode) as learningStyle, st.remark, IFNULL(SUM(cs.num*cs.unit_price),0) as totalPrice,
CASE WHEN sca.begin_of_select_time > SYSDATE() THEN 0 /*未开课*/ WHEN sca.begin_of_select_time < SYSDATE() AND SYSDATE() < sca.end_of_select_time THEN 1 /*开始选课*/ WHEN sca.end_of_select_time < SYSDATE() AND SYSDATE() < sca.curr_start_time THEN 2 /*备课中*/ WHEN SYSDATE() > sca.curr_start_time AND SYSDATE() < date_add( sca.curr_start_time, INTERVAL ( SELECT CEILING( tc.class_hours / count(ts.id) ) * 7 FROM hklk_curriculum tc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_curriculum_apply tsca ON tc.id = tsca.curriculum_id LEFT JOIN hklk_school_syllabus ts ON tsca.id = ts.sca_id WHERE tsca.id = sca.id GROUP BY tsca.id ) DAY ) THEN 3 /*开始上课*/ WHEN SYSDATE() > date_add( sca.curr_start_time, INTERVAL ( SELECT CEILING( tc.class_hours / count(ts.id) ) * 7 FROM hklk_curriculum tc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_curriculum_apply tsca ON tc.id = tsca.curriculum_id LEFT JOIN hklk_school_syllabus ts ON tsca.id = ts.sca_id WHERE tsca.id = sca.id GROUP BY tsca.id ) DAY ) THEN 4 /*已结束*/ END AS applyStatus,
(select count(1) from hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc where scc.sca_id = sca.id and pay_state !=-1) AS studentNum, (sca.max_num - (select count(1) from hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc where scc.sca_id = sca.id and pay_state !=-1)) AS surplus FROM hklk_school_curriculum_apply sca LEFT JOIN hklk_school_teacher st ON sca.teacher_id = st.id LEFT JOIN hklk_curriculum c ON sca.curriculum_id = c.id LEFT JOIN hklk_consumables cs on sca.curriculum_id = cs.curriculum_id WHERE sca.status = 3 AND sca.school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY sca.id ) h LEFT JOIN hklk_school_syllabus ss ON h.id = ss.sca_id where h.applyStatus in (1,2,3) /*查询精品*/
and h.grade like CONCAT('%', #{grade}, '%') group by h.id ORDER BY h.applyStatus,h.currStartTime DESC
group by h.id ORDER BY h.applyStatus,h.currStartTime DESC
/*查询精品*/ and h.isFineQuality = 1 group by h.id ORDER BY h.surplus DESC LIMIT 0,10
/*查询热门课程*/ and h.isFineQuality = 0 group by h.id ORDER BY h.surplus LIMIT 0,10

CASE WHEN sca.begin_of_select_time > SYSDATE() THEN 0 /*未开课*/ WHEN sca.begin_of_select_time < SYSDATE() AND SYSDATE() < sca.end_of_select_time THEN 1 /*开始选课*/ WHEN sca.end_of_select_time < SYSDATE() AND SYSDATE() < sca.curr_start_time THEN 2 /*备课中*/ WHEN SYSDATE() > sca.curr_start_time AND SYSDATE() < date_add( sca.curr_start_time, INTERVAL ( SELECT CEILING( tc.class_hours / count(ts.id) ) * 7 FROM hklk_curriculum tc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_curriculum_apply tsca ON tc.id = tsca.curriculum_id LEFT JOIN hklk_school_syllabus ts ON tsca.id = ts.sca_id WHERE tsca.id = sca.id GROUP BY tsca.id ) DAY ) THEN 3 /*开始上课*/ WHEN SYSDATE() > date_add( sca.curr_start_time, INTERVAL ( SELECT CEILING( tc.class_hours / count(ts.id) ) * 7 FROM hklk_curriculum tc LEFT JOIN hklk_school_curriculum_apply tsca ON tc.id = tsca.curriculum_id LEFT JOIN hklk_school_syllabus ts ON tsca.id = ts.sca_id WHERE tsca.id = sca.id GROUP BY tsca.id ) DAY ) THEN 4 /*已结束*/ END AS applyStatus,
(select count(1) from hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc where scc.sca_id = sca.id and pay_state =1) AS studentNum, (sca.max_num - (select count(1) from hklk_student_choice_curriculum scc where scc.sca_id = sca.id and pay_state =1)) AS surplus FROM hklk_school_curriculum_apply sca LEFT JOIN hklk_school_teacher st ON sca.teacher_id = st.id LEFT JOIN hklk_curriculum c ON sca.curriculum_id = c.id LEFT JOIN hklk_consumables cs on sca.curriculum_id = cs.curriculum_id WHERE sca.id = #{scaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY sca.id) tmp left JOIN hklk_school_syllabus h ON tmp.id = h.sca_id GROUP BY tmp.id
